concept.title: 3.8 Conduct and Document the Comparative Analysis

conbody.p:
3.8.1 The SSACâ€™s comparative analysis of proposals and award recommendation is documented in the Comparative Analysis Report and Award Recommendation (CAR). The tailorable
Comparative Analysis Report and Award Recommendation
template is available for use, as desired.
